message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're lowballing, let's meet in the middle!
I'll meet you halfway, but not all the way to your side!
You're getting closer, but I think I can do better than that!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not getting taken for a ride!
You're getting closer, but I think I can squeeze a bit more out of this!
Let's make a deal, Bob! We're almost there!
